statements: SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT id, action_type, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'verbal warning';
SELECT description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, action_type FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type IN ('written warning', 'dismissal') ORDER BY employee_id, action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'Warning';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, action_type FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type = 'Termination' AND description ILIKE '%violation%';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, action_reason FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT behavior_desc FROM employee_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(id) AS num_actions FROM disciplinary_actions GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_actions > 1;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT id, action_reason FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_reason LIKE '%warning%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT employee_id, action_date FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_date;
SELECT id, behavior_desc FROM employee_behavior WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions da JOIN employee_behavior eb ON da.employee_id = eb.employee_id WHERE da.employee_id = 3 ORDER BY da.action_date DESC, eb.behavior_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_behavior ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT action_date, action_description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT performance_rating FROM employee_performance WHERE review_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%warning%';
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employee_behavior WHERE employee_department='HR';
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 3 AND review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT disciplinary_id, employee_id, action_description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%warning%';
SELECT * FROM employee_behavior ORDER BY employee_name ASC, employee_department DESC;
SELECT * FROM disciplinary_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, action_type, description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM employee_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'Misconduct' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, department_name, supervisor FROM employees INNER JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM employees WHERE hire_date<'2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name, supervisor FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_date, description FROM disciplinary_actions WHERE action_type='Verbal Warning';
SELECT employee_id, behavior_type, notes FROM employee_behavior WHERE behavior_date>'2022-03-01' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM Employee WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, behavior_date, behavior_description FROM EmployeeBehavior WHERE employee_id = 5;
SELECT employee_name, ranking_score FROM EmployeeRanking WHERE ranking_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_id FROM Employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT ea.employee_id, ea.action_date, da.action_type, da.comments FROM DisciplinaryAction da JOIN Employee ea ON da.employee_id = ea.employee_id;
